scores.title: Subscription required for usage
scores.description: Access to app features requires an active merchant subscription.

scores.title: QR redemption flow
scores.description: Secure QR redemption with single-use and time-bound validity.

scores.title: Offer approval workflow
scores.description: Moderation workflow for offers including draft, pending, and active states.

scores.title: Points balance tracking
flows: Earn points → Firestore transaction → Balance updated
Redeem points → Firestore transaction → Audit entry
scores.description: Points accrual and redemption tracked with transactional integrity and audit logs.

scores.title: Mobile apps functional
flows: Launch app → Navigate core flows → Backend methods invoked
scores.description: Customer and merchant mobile applications operate with wired backend methods.

scores.title: Phone + OTP auth
flows: Enter phone → Receive OTP → Verify → Authenticated
scores.description: Phone-based authentication using one-time passwords delivered via SMS.

scores.title: Arabic + English
scores.description: Bilingual user interface supporting Arabic and English locales.

scores.title: Location-based prioritization
flows: Detect location → Sort offers by proximity
scores.description: Offer listing prioritizes nearby offers rather than national-only browsing.

scores.title: Push notifications
flows: Create campaign → Send push → User receives notification
scores.description: Push delivery for campaigns and events via FCM.
